Name: VR Quiet Life
About the game: Enjoy a freedom slow life in nature in VR space Live in a log house, and play freely until it's time to go home Enjoy catching insects, fishing, cooking and also communicating with your partner What you can do will increase little by little as the day progresses ã€€ You can choose from two partners(Only appearance changes) It is also possible to use the 3D model you want If you don't have VR equipment, you can play on your desktop like a normal game *The image was taken when the product was still under development
